desc: 全てのユニットの防御力を３０％アップ＆全状態異常を無効＆弱点属性ダメージを軽減

dictionary.lore: Once upon a time, a small minority fought to protect its tribal holy land against countless invaders. The tribe passed down this sinister, misshapen helmet from generation to generation, and its chieftains always wore it while leading at the battlefront. The tribe's soldiers would gain absolute confidence upon seeing this, as it symbolized their people. Meanwhile, it is said to have instilled the fear of death in enemies and weakened their morale.

name: 黒妖兜ヘル・クル

usage.name: 神護杖ラグファリータ
